text: this is probably the very last thing
you'd expect to find when you come home
from work but at around 4 p.m. local
time on Monday a small plane towing an
advertising banner flew straight into
this building in northglenn some 19
kilometers north of Denver Colorado the
plane and the house immediately burst
into flames at least 6 fire trucks
rushed to the scene and soaked the house
to put out the blaze believe it or not
the pilot actually walked away from this
crash with just a few cuts and bruises
which is hard to imagine when you see
this footage from the scene he was taken
to a local hospital for a checkup just
to make sure there are no injuries
what's even more incredible is that
there was no one in the house when the
crash happened
witnesses say the plane seemed to be
struggling to stay in the air but
there's no word yet as to why it fell
out of the sky causing thousands of
dollars worth of damage to someone's
home
Wendy Earhart BBC news
